changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE risk ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, positive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false, probability INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 3, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (probability >= 1), CHECK (probability <= 9), UNIQUE(project, text) ); CREATE INDEX idx_risk1 ON risk (project);

CREATE TABLE effect ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, impact INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 3, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (impact >= 1), CHECK (impact <= 9), UNIQUE(project, text) ); CREATE INDEX idx_effect1 ON effect (project);

CREATE TABLE ranked ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), rank INT NOT NULL, mnemo VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, path VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (rank >= 1), CHECK (rank <= 81), UNIQUE(project, path) ); CREATE INDEX idx_ranked1 ON ranked (project, rank, mnemo, path, text);

CREATE TABLE agenda ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, login VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, plan INT NOT NULL REFERENCES plan(id), path VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, text TEXT NOT NULL, deadline TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, UNIQUE(plan) ); CREATE INDEX idx_agenda1 ON agenda (login, deadline, path, text);
